entry.title: Building a world class document pipeline using Python
entry.summary:
Description

At Brokersavant, we process large quantities of real estate assets ranging from commercial property flyers to large real estate leases and our customers expect a lightning fast turn around. Learn how we leveraged open source technologies and Python libraries to create a system that scales to millions of assets per day without missing a beat.

entry.title: Static Code Analysis with Python
entry.summary:
Description

Auditing a code base for code formatting mistakes, potential security vulnerabilities or defects can be time consuming. Static code analysis will let the computer do that for you. Learn how to use code static analysis to catch errors early and improve code quality in your Python codebase.
